title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rise, oil prices fall as traders look ahead to Fed decision - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rise, oil prices fall as traders look ahead to Fed decision  Yahoo Finance
description: S&P 500 and Dow futures rose Monday morning to shake off some recent losses, with investors looking ahead to the Federal Reserve's next monetary policy decision later this week amid an ongoing war in Ukraine and soaring inflation.
